value:
This world is dazzling...the people,
the trees, even the wind. The light of
life is so...so...abundant.

Hel, the realm of the dead... I lived
there so long with only my mother.

If you are tired, I'll help you sleep.
Just for the night—not forever.

Imagine that your body is ravaged by
incurable disease or wracked with
pain that never ceases...$k$pYou'd consider death a kindness
then.

My blade, Lyfja, offers death to those
who seek it. To those who wish to
live, it offers compassion instead.

I am Eir, daughter of the sovereign of
death. Do not worry. I seek only
friendship—not your life.
Strength wells up within me...
Life is growth... I am no exception.

No, no—I am not performing as I
should. I apologize.

Thank you. I see it so clearly now—
your kindness makes me feel such
happiness.

I am Eir of the realm of the dead. But
now, I have become your prisoner—
haven't I?

Ah, $Nu...
I apologize if I look gloomy to you.
I am not used to smiling.$k$pDid I smile as a child? I can't quite
recall... My memories are so fuzzy, so
faint...$k$pI remember giving Mother a flower.
She smiled, and I was so happy.$k$pI am still that child. I would still love
to make someone happy like I did
then.$k$pMaybe...if I can bring you a little joy,
my life would have some value to it.$k$pPlease, tell me what I can do. If I
could help, I'd be happy. I'd have
accomplished something, at least.
はっ
そうね…
きゃああっ！
だめ…！
A merciful death.
Fly, Lyfja!
And now, you rest.
You won't suffer.
Death comes to me.
ふふ…
My name is Eir. I am known to all as the princess of the kingdom of death.
I have noticed that you're overly familiar with everyone.
When people suffer, truly suffer, that is when their hearts open to death.
Death is deliverance. Of course, for those who wish to live, it doesn't seem that way.
All people die, sooner or later. That is what makes their lives shine so brightly.
I have dreams, sometimes... Blue skies, white wings, gentle smiles....
I hope that you will live. This is a new feeling for me.
Yes.
Death's caress...
The glimmer of life.
